p: The PaO 2, PaCO 2, A-aDO 2, OI, Ppeak, Pplat, Cst, Cdyn of the two groups at T1-T3 were not statistically significant. Compared with Group C, PaO 2, and OI of Group L increased significantly at T4 ( P=0.027, P=0.027, respectively). Compared with Group C, Ppeak, Pplat and A-aDO 2 of Group L decreased significantly at T4 ( P<0.001, P<0.001, P=0.025, respectively) ( Table 3).
